p: ANN were used to classify the ripening stages of EOs. Multilayer perceptron (MLP), a common type of ANN for classification purposes [ 40], was used as the classifier in MATLAB, Neural Network Toolbox. The ability to model complex non-linear input space partitions are among the benefits which are provided by ANNs [ 41]. For the classification of ripening stages, ANNs were designed, trained, and tested according to the procedure described in Figure 2. The initial data set consisted of 303 samples (101 EOs were measured in triplicate) and 22 features (logarithmic peak heights) as inputs. The MLPs had four outputs; each class of ripening was coded by a four-digit binary number where 1 indicates class membership.
